abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid33180882, pmid33190346, pmid33179546, pmid33166189, pmid33197204, pmid33174637, pmid33170104, pmid33166429, pmid32888013, pmid33154030
